column5: an accident happened when a Hilux Vigo with a license plate number 2R-3866
column8: a resident of  Chreav Svay commune. Sre Ambel
column10: hit a buffalo crossing the road. The animal was killed and the car suffered serious damage.------The incident occurred in Rithy I Village 1
column13: Preah Sihanouk Province. The driver of the Vigo escaped without any injuries.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/396561
